author: holiman
content: <@!531145505355464708> I guess it's because it accesses that slot in `8     SSTORE     20000     [0x11,0x1]`

author: holiman
content: And I don't think 1352 is suitable for this -- that would mean we leave 65K addresses open for call trie-lookup-attacks

author: holiman
content: Great that you're implementing this, so we get a cross-check if my implementation is correct. Once I'm more certain it's correct, it would be time to do another analysis of mainnet consequences (like the one I did on goerli, but larger, and for mainnet)

author: holiman
content: My bad, it's due to the "naked sstore"  `13     SSTORE     22100     [0x11,0x2]`
